trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref>创建使用指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: Binds the data source to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 将绑定到数据源<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataBind method to bind data from a data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定方法用于将数据绑定到数据源从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This method resolves all data-binding expressions in the active template of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会解析所有活动模板中的控件的数据绑定表达式。

trans-unit.source: The DataBind method is called automatically if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control refers to a valid data source control.
trans-unit.target: 如果自动调用 DataBind 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件是指一个有效的数据源控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of manually calling the DataBind method, you can use model binding with your DataBind control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A> property to the name of a method that returns data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: 而不是手动调用数据绑定方法，你可以使用模型绑定与数据绑定控件通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A>属性的返回数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>方法的名称</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is then automatically populated with the data that is returned from the select method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>然后从选择的方法返回的数据自动填充。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Model binding can simplify your code for working with data.
trans-unit.target: 模型绑定可以简化你的代码用于使用数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数组，其中包含有关中显示的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKeyNames property to specify the field or fields that represent the primary key of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用将字段名以指定字段或表示数据源的主键字段。

trans-unit.source: You should only set this property to the field or fields that are required to uniquely identify each row; for example, the ID column if an integer value uniquely identifies each row.
trans-unit.target: 你应仅将此属性设置为或多个唯一地标识每个行; 所需的字段例如，如果唯一的整数值的 ID 列标识的每一行。

trans-unit.source: You must set the DataKeyNames property in order for the automatic update and delete features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to work.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置将字段名属性，才能自动更新和删除的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制工作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The values of these key fields are passed to the data source control in order to specify the row to update or delete.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要更新或删除的行情况下，这些键字段的值传递到数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: If you need to retrieve the data key value when updating or deleting a row, use the `Keys` property of either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要检索密钥值更新时数据，也可以删除行，使用`Keys`属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For example, `e.Keys[0]` holds the value of the first data key in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`e.Keys[0]`保留的值中的第一个数据密钥<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: If you need to retrieve the data key value when a row is selected, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要选择行时检索数据的密钥值，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the DataKeyNames property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically populates its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection with the values from the specified field or fields, which provides a convenient way to access the primary keys of each row.
trans-unit.target: 当将字段名属性设置时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动填充其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合的值从指定的字段或字段，它提供一种简便方式访问的每个行的主键。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control stores these key field values in the control state.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将这些键字段值存储中的控件状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: If these values contain sensitive information, it is strongly recommended that you enable view-state encryption by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A> property to `ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些值包含敏感信息，强烈建议你通过设置启用视图状态加密<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>属性`ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use automatically generated field columns (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `true`), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control makes sure that the columns that correspond to the field or fields specified in the DataKeyNames property are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用自动生成字段列 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>属性`true`)，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件可确保在将字段名属性中指定的字段相对应的列是只读的。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a column field is set to `false`, the column is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and the data for the column does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>列字段的属性设置为`false`，列才会显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件和列的数据不会进行一次往返过程向客户端。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a column that is not visible to be available to the client, add the field name to the DataKeyNames property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望为不可见要向客户端提供的列的数据，将添加到将字段名属性的字段名称。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，包含主键的名称字段中显示的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> objects that represent the data key value of each row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>表示数据的对象中的每一行的键值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>控件中的每一行的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object contains the values of the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象包含的字段或字段中指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's DataKeys collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>随后会将对象添加到控件的 DataKeys 集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKeys property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataKeys 属性来检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象中的特定数据行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for the currently selected row.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>属性，以检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象当前所选的行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property to retrieve the data key value for the currently selected row directly.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>属性直接检索当前所选行的数据密钥值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"></xref> that contains the data key of each row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray"> </xref>包含中的每一行数据密钥<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to call in order to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要调用以便删除数据的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性会导致模型绑定要用作数据绑定方法。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the record at the specified index from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 从数据源中删除指定索引处的记录。

trans-unit.source: Use the DeleteRow method to programmatically delete the record at the specified index from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DeleteRow 方法以编程方式从数据源中删除指定索引处的记录。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to delete a record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要删除来自外部的记录通常使用此方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，例如页上的其他控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> events.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法也会引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to delete.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的行索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is not bound to a data source control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>控件未绑定到数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: The data source control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to does not support delete operations, or there is no delete command defined for the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件绑定到不支持删除操作，或没有为数据源定义 delete 命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要编辑的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index is zero-based (the first row is row zero).
trans-unit.target: 是从零开始的行索引 （第一行是零）。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only in the following scenarios, which involve handlers for specific events: - You want the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to open in edit mode for a specific row the first time that the page is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 仅在以下情况下，这涉及到特定事件的处理程序中通常使用此属性:-你想<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制在特定行的编辑模式下打开显示的页面的第一个时间。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To do this, you can set the EditIndex property in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class or of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，可以设置 EditIndex 属性中的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>类或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>

trans-unit.source: - You want to know which row was edited after the row was updated.
trans-unit.target: -你想要知道哪些行已编辑后更新了该行。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you can retrieve the row index from the EditIndex property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，可以检索的行索引中的 EditIndex 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>

trans-unit.source: - You are binding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: -你正在绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>到通过设置数据源的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性以编程方式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: In this case you must set the EditIndex property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下必须在中设置 EditIndex 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>

trans-unit.source: If you set the EditIndex property after a postback or in handlers for events that are raised later than the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control might not enter edit mode for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: 如果回发后或处理程序引发的事件中设置 EditIndex 属性晚于<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件可能不进入编辑模式，为指定的行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>

trans-unit.source: If you read the value of this property in other event handlers, the index is not guaranteed to reflect the row that is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 如果你读取的其他事件处理程序中的该属性的值，则不保证索引以反映正在编辑的行。

trans-unit.source: To determine which row the user has clicked an **Edit** button or hyperlink in before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control enters edit mode, you can retrieve the row index from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定用户在哪一行已单击**编辑**按钮或中的超链接之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件进入编辑模式，您可以检索的行索引从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control from entering edit mode after a user has clicked an **Edit** button or hyperlink, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object to `true` in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件进入编辑模式，用户单击后**编辑**按钮或超链接、 集<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>对象传递给`true`中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要编辑的行的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that no row is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为-1，指示正在编辑任何行。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引是小于-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the row selected for editing in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>对象，它使你能够设置中选择进行编辑的行的外观<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the EditRowStyle property to control the appearance of the row being edited in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EditRowStyle 属性来控制正在编辑中的行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性:-将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<EditRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -嵌套`<EditRowStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the row being edited in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>表示中正在编辑的行的样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>使你能够设置空数据行的外观的对象呈现时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件绑定到数据源不包含任何记录。

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataRowStyle property to control the appearance of the null row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EmptyDataRowStyle 属性来控制中的 null 行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The null row is displayed when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定到控件的数据源不包含任何记录，将显示为 null 的行。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性:-将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<EmptyDataRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -嵌套`<EmptyDataRowStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that enables you to set the appearance of the null row.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> ，可用于设置为 null 的行的外观。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的用户定义的内容，空的数据行中呈现时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件绑定到数据源不包含任何记录。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空数据行显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制当绑定到控件的数据源不包含任何记录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by using the EmptyDataTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用要属性定义为空的数据行自己自定义用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the empty data row, first place `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自定义模板为空的数据行，第一次将`<EmptyDataTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容`<EmptyDataTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制空数据行的样式，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the built-in UI for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以使用内置用户界面为空的数据行通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>而不是此属性的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to programmatically access controls that you declare in an empty data template, see [How to: Access Server Controls by ID](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何以编程方式访问控件的空数据模板中声明的信息，请参阅[如何︰ 按 ID 访问服务器控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> and EmptyDataTemplate properties are set, the EmptyDataTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果这两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>和要设置、 要属性优先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含空的数据行的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在空的数据行中显示的文本呈现时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件绑定到数据源不包含任何记录。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空数据行显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制当绑定到控件的数据源不包含任何记录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataText property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: EmptyDataText 属性用于指定要在空的数据行中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制空数据行的样式，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以通过设置定义为空的数据行自己自定义用户界面 (UI)<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>而不是此属性的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the EmptyDataText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果这两个 EmptyDataText 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>属性优先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 要在空数据行中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否验证程序控件将处理在 insert 过程中发生或更新操作的异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果验证程序控件将处理异常，在 insert 过程中发生或更新操作;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the selection of a row is based on index or on data-key values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示行的选择基于索引或数据密钥值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false` and a row is selected, the same row is selected when a new page is displayed even though the new page has different data in it.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`false`和选择行时，会显示一个新页面，即使新页中有不同的数据时选择同一行。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, when you display a page that has different data in it, no row is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为`true`时显示中，有不同的数据的页，不选择任何行。

trans-unit.source: If you then return to the page on which a row was selected, that row is still selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果你然后返回到所选行的网页，该行仍处于选中状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row selection is based on data-key values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果行选择基于数据密钥值;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side callbacks are used for sorting and paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将客户端回调用于排序和分页操作。

trans-unit.source: By default, when a sorting or paging operation is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control posts back to the server to perform the operation.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当执行排序或分页操作，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件回发到服务器以执行该操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When the EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks property is set to `true`, a service is called on the client to perform sorting and paging operations, which eliminates the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当 EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks 属性设置为`true`、 服务客户端上调用来执行排序和分页操作，而不需要将发布回服务器。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all browsers support this feature.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 并非所有浏览器都支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a browser supports this feature, use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定浏览器是否支持此功能，请使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>

trans-unit.source: All columns in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection must support callbacks for this feature to work.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合必须支持此功能正常工作的回调。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection contains a column that does not support callbacks, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合包含的列，不支持回调，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>、<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发异常。</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use client-side callbacks for sorting and paging operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要用于排序和分页操作，则为客户端回调否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns*> collection contains a column that does not support callbacks, such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns*>集合包含的列，不支持回调，如<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField"> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the values of each field declared within the specified row and stores them in the specified <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 检索在指定行内声明每个字段的值，并将其存储在指定<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The ExtractRowValues method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to retrieve the values of each field declared within the row specified by the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: ExtractRowValues 方法是由调用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>要检索的声明中指定的行的每个字段的值控件`row`参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the extracted values include read-only fields and key fields by using the `includeReadOnlyFields` and `includePrimaryKey` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定提取的值使用是否包含只读字段和键字段`includeReadOnlyFields`和`includePrimaryKey`参数，分别。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> used to store the field values.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref>用于存储字段值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> from which to retrieve the field values.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref>要从中检索字段值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include read-only fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包含只读字段;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the primary key field or fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括的主键字段或字段;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>对象，表示中的页脚行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FooterRow 属性以编程方式访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象，表示中的页脚行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The FooterRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> FooterRow 属性是之后才可用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建中的页脚行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要以编程方式操作页脚行中的，例如在添加自定义内容时，通常使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the FooterRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 之后，必须执行对 FooterRow 属性进行任何修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件已经被呈现; 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将覆盖所有更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref>表示中的页脚行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>对象，可用于设置中的页脚行的外观<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterStyle property to control the appearance of the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FooterStyle 属性来控制中的页脚行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性:-将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `FooterStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<FooterStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -嵌套`<FooterStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FooterStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>该对象表示中的页脚行样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: 返回的结果以控件为目标的回调事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to asynchronously retrieve data and the GetCallbackResult method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件实现<xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>接口并使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>以异步方式检索数据和 GetCallbackResult 方法检索到的数据返回到控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: 回调的结果。

trans-unit.source: Creates the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 创建执行排序操作的按钮的回调脚本。

trans-unit.source: The GetCallbackScript method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: GetCallbackScript 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建执行排序操作的按钮的回调脚本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The button control for which to create the callback script.
trans-unit.target: 要为其创建回调脚本按钮控件中。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the callback script.
trans-unit.target: 要传递到回调脚本的参数。

trans-unit.source: The callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行排序操作的按钮回调脚本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gridline style for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置网格线样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the GridLines property to specify the gridline style for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用网格线属性指定的网格线样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的样式。

trans-unit.source: |Style|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`GridLines.None`|No gridlines are displayed.| |`GridLines.Horizontal`|Displays the horizontal gridlines only.| |`GridLines.Vertical`|Displays the vertical gridlines only.| |`GridLines.Both`|Displays both the horizontal and vertical gridlines.|
trans-unit.target: |样式 |说明 | |-----------|-----------------| |`GridLines.None`|显示没有网格线。 | |`GridLines.Horizontal`|显示水平网格线。 | |`GridLines.Vertical`|显示垂直网格线。 | |`GridLines.Both`|显示水平和垂直网格。 |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_GridLines.Both" name="GridLines.Both" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_GridLines.Both" name="GridLines.Both" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>对象，表示中的标题行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HeaderRow 属性以编程方式访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象，表示中的标题行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HeaderRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> HeaderRow 属性是之后才可用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建中的标题行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the header row, for example, when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要以编程方式操作标头行，例如，添加自定义的内容时，通常使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the HeaderRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 之后，必须执行对 HeaderRow 属性进行任何修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件已经被呈现; 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将覆盖所有更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref>表示中的标题行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>对象，可用于设置中的标题行的外观<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderStyle property to control the appearance of the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HeaderStyle 属性来控制中的标题行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性:-将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<HeaderStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -嵌套`<HeaderStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>表示中的标题行的样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的水平对齐方式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the HorizontalAlign property to specify the horizontal alignment of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control within the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HorizontalAlign 属性指定的水平对齐方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>页内的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了不同的水平对齐样式。

trans-unit.source: |Alignment value|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |`HorizontalAlign.NotSet`|The horizontal alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has not been set.| |`HorizontalAlign.Left`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is left-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Center`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is centered on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Right`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is right-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Justify`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.|
trans-unit.target: |对齐值 |说明 | |---------------------|-----------------| |`HorizontalAlign.NotSet`|尚未设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件的水平对齐方式。 | |`HorizontalAlign.Left`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件是左对齐页面上。 | |`HorizontalAlign.Center`|在页面上居中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。 | |`HorizontalAlign.Right`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件是右对齐的页上的对齐。 | |`HorizontalAlign.Justify`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件对齐与页面的左侧和右侧页边距。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlign.NotSet" name="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlign.NotSet" name="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The IsBindableType method is a helper method that is commonly used by control developers to programmatically determine whether the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the properties in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to load the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于加载中的属性的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中需要保留，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved control state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>包含控件保存的控件状态的值。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的视图状态的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>包含控件保存的视图状态值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the Web server control is passed up the page's user interface (UI) server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否沿页的用户界面 (UI) 服务器控件层次结构向上传递 Web 服务器控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnBubbleEvent method implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to pass events from child controls to the page hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: OnBubbleEvent 方法实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法将从子控件的事件传递到页层次结构。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件已被取消;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Rebinds the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control to its data after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 重新绑定次数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件之后，其数据与<> *1>， <> </> *1>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>属性更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: The OnDataPropertyChanged method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to rebind the control to its data after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: OnDataPropertyChanged 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件重新绑定之后，其数据的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>属性更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceViewChanged method notifies a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceViewChanged 方法通知<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>基础数据源已更改，该控件应重新绑定的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the OnDataSourceViewChanged method is called when a property of the data source view has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，OnDataSourceViewChanged 方法称为数据源视图的属性已更改时。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceViewChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceViewChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法通知，Web 服务器控件必须执行任何所需创建并设置实例的初始化步骤。

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's View state has yet to be populated.
trans-unit.target: 在此阶段的服务器控件的生命周期中，控件的视图状态尚未填充。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当调用此方法时，无论是否的子级或父级到该控件不能访问其他服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: 不保证其他服务器控件都可创建并准备好进行访问。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event is raised when a data row (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object) is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
