trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 单击某一行的编辑按钮，但之前时发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: The RowEditing event is raised when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 单击某一行的编辑按钮，但之前引发 RowEditing 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件进入编辑模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the edit operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，如取消编辑的操作，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the edit operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您可以确定当前行的索引，并可以指示是否应取消编辑操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the edit operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消编辑操作，请设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the column to use as the column header for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用作的列标题的列名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性是以使控件的辅助技术设备用户更易于访问。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, the header of a table can be associated with either a row or a column.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，可以与行或列关联的标头的表。

trans-unit.source: The direction is specified by setting the `scope` attribute of the `<th>` elements.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置指定的方向`scope`属性`<th>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a built-in header row that can be displayed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件有内置的标题行，可以通过设置显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally specify a header column (usually the first or last column in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) by setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以选择指定一个标题列 (通常是第一个或最后一列中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件) 通过设置此属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, all cells in the column that corresponds to the specified field name are rendered as `<th scope="row">` elements.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，对应于指定的字段名称的列中的所有单元格都呈现为`<th scope="row">`元素。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although the specified column is treated like a header, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> properties do not apply to the header column.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 指定的列都被视为标头，尽管<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A>属性不适用于标题列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default rendering of the `<th>` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 默认呈现`<th>`保留了元素，从而文本水平呈现为加粗和居中。

trans-unit.source: Developers can override the behavior of the `<th>` element using a cascading style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以重写的行为`<th>`元素使用级联样式表。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property works only with bound fields.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性仅适用于绑定的字段。

trans-unit.source: It does not work with template fields.
trans-unit.target: 它并不适用于模板字段。

trans-unit.source: The name of the column to use as the column header.
trans-unit.target: 要用作列标题的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> objects that represent the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>代表中的数据行的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The Rows property (collection) is used to store the data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 行属性 （集合） 用于存储中的数据行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically populates the Rows collection by creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object for each record in the data source and then adding each object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动填充行集合通过创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象数据源中的每个记录，然后将每个对象添加到集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to access a specific row in the control or to iterate though the entire collection of rows.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问控件中的特定行，或者用于循环访问的行的整个集合，通常使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only rows with their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property set to `DataControlRowType.DataRow` are stored in the Rows collection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 仅行与其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>属性设置为`DataControlRowType.DataRow`行集合中存储。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects that represent the header, footer, and pager rows are not included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>集合中未包含这些对象表示的页眉、 页脚和页导航行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"></xref> that contains all the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"> </xref>包含中的所有数据行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>对象，可用于设置中的数据行的外观<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the RowStyle property to control the appearance of the data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RowStyle 属性来控制中的数据行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the RowStyle settings and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>也设置属性，RowStyle 设置之间交替显示的数据行和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `RowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性:-将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `RowStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<RowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -嵌套`<RowStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `RowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the data rows in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>表示中的数据行的样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: 单击某一行的更新按钮，但之后时发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件更新行。

trans-unit.source: The RowUpdated event is raised when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: 单击某一行的更新按钮，但之后引发 RowUpdated 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件更新行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，例如检查更新操作的结果，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您能够确定受影响的行和可能发生的任何异常的数量。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常的事件处理方法中通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: 单击某一行的更新按钮，但之前时发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件更新行。

trans-unit.source: The RowUpdating event is raised when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: 单击某一行的更新按钮后，之前引发 RowUpdating 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件更新行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，如取消更新操作中，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您可以确定当前行的索引，并可以指示是否应取消更新操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the update operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消更新操作，请设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>集合，如有必要之前的值传递到数据源,。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: A common way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些集合的常用方法是要进行 HTML 编码的用户提供的才能在数据源中存储的值。

trans-unit.source: This helps to prevent script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: 这有助于防止脚本注入式攻击。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections are automatically populated only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is bound to data by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>自动填充集合时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>通过使用将控件绑定到数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the properties in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 保存的状态中的属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件中需要保留，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to save the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于保存中的属性的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中需要保留，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器控件的当前视图状态。

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的视图状态的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>包含控件保存的视图状态值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object that contains the data key value for the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>对象，其中包含中的选定行的数据键值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control using the value or values of the specified field or fields.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象使用的指定的字段或字段的值的控件中的每一行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>随后会将对象添加到控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> property is used to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>属性用于检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象中的特定数据行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you just need to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object of the currently selected row, you can simply use the SelectedDataKey property as a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果您只需要检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象的当前选定的行中，你只可以使用 SelectedDataKey 属性作为快捷方式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This is the same as retrieving the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object at the index specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 这是与检索相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>由指定索引处对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>属性从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property to retrieve the data key value for the currently selected row directly.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>属性直接检索当前所选行的数据密钥值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object and want to access a key field other than the first field, use the indexed SelectedDataKey property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果要创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>对象，并想要访问的第一个字段以外的键字段，请使用中的索引的 SelectedDataKey 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: An example is shown below.
trans-unit.target: 一个示例所示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> for the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref>中所选行的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that no row is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，指示当前选择任何行。

trans-unit.source: No data keys are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames*> property.
trans-unit.target: 中指定任何数据密钥<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在所选行的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedIndex property to determine the index of the currently selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SelectedIndex 属性来确定在当前所选行的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically select a row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此属性以编程方式选择控件中的行。

trans-unit.source: To clear the selection of a row, set this property to -1.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除行的选择，请将此属性设置为-1。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the currently selected row can be customized by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用自定义当前所选行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access the currently selected row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问当前选定的行，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 在所选行的从零开始的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that no row is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为-1，指示当前选择任何行。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndex property is set to a value less than -1.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndex 属性设置为小于-1 的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: 单击某一行的选择按钮，但之后时发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件处理选择操作。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndexChanged event is raised when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: 单击某一行的选择按钮，但之后引发 SelectedIndexChanged 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理选择操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a status label with the currently selected row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，例如使用当前选定的行中，更新状态标签，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: 单击某一行的选择按钮，但之前时发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件处理选择操作。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndexChanging event is raised when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: 单击某一行的选择按钮后，之前引发 SelectedIndexChanging 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理选择操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the selection operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，如取消所选内容的操作，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event is not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 以编程方式设置时，将不会引发此事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the row selected by the user and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您可以确定用户选择的行的索引，并可以指示是否应取消了选择操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the selection operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消选择操作，请设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data-key value for the persisted selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中的持久化选定项的数据密钥值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The data key for the persisted selected item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的持久化选定项的数据键值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that no item is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，指示当前未选定任何项。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the selected row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>表示控件中的所选的行的对象。

trans-unit.source: When a row is selected in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, use the SelectedRow property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents that row.
trans-unit.target: 在选择行时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，请使用 SelectedRow 属性来检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>表示该行的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This is the same as retrieving the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object at the index specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 这是与检索相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>由指定索引处对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>属性从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: This object can then be used to access the properties of the selected row.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以使用此对象访问所选行的属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the selected row in the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> ，表示控件中的所选的行。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that enables you to set the appearance of the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>对象，可用于设置中所选行的外观<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedRowStyle property to control the appearance of the selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SelectedRowStyle 属性来控制在所选行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `SelectedRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性:-将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `SelectedRowStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<SelectedRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: -嵌套`<SelectedRowStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SelectedRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SelectedRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> ，表示在所选行的样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data key value of the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取中所选行的数据键值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set with a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control using the value or values of the specified field or fields.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性设置以逗号分隔的表示数据源的主键值的字段名称列表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象使用的指定的字段或字段的值的控件中的每一行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>随后会将对象添加到控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> property is used to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>属性用于检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象中的特定数据行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you just need to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object of the currently selected row, you can simply use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property as a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果您只需要检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象的当前选定的行中，你可以只使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>作为快捷方式的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: As a further shortcut, you can directly determine the data key value of the first key field of the selected row by using the SelectedValue property.
trans-unit.target: 为更快捷的方式，可以直接使用 SelectedValue 属性来确定所选行的第一个键字段的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object and want to access a key field other than the first field, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果要创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>对象并且想要访问的键字段以外的第一个字段，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data key value of the selected row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 数据中所选行的键值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Selects the row to edit in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 选择要编辑中的行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要编辑的行索引。

trans-unit.source: Puts a row in edit mode in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control by using the specified row index.
trans-unit.target: 将行处于编辑模式中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件通过使用指定的行索引。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要编辑的行索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the page index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control by using the row index.
trans-unit.target: 设置的页索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件使用的行索引。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row on the page to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要编辑的页的行索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the footer row is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在显示页脚行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowFooter property to specify whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays the footer row.
trans-unit.target: ShowFooter 属性用于指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件显示页脚行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制页脚行的外观，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the footer row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要显示页脚行中;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the header row is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在显示标头行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowHeader property to specify whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays the header row.
trans-unit.target: ShowHeader 属性用于指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件显示的标题行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the header row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制标头行的外观，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the header row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要显示标头行中;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the heading of a column in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is visible when the column has no data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否中的列标题<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>列不包含数据时，控件是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the header is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果标题是否可见;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control based on the specified sort expression and direction.
trans-unit.target: 排序<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件基于指定的排序表达式和方向。

trans-unit.source: Use the Sort method to programmatically sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control using the specified sort expression and direction.
trans-unit.target: 排序方法用于以编程方式排序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制是通过使用指定的排序表达式和方向。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The sort expression specifies the column or columns with which to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序表达式指定的列或包含要排序的列。

trans-unit.source: To sort multiple columns, create a sort expression that contains a comma-separated list of field names.
trans-unit.target: 若要对多个列进行排序，创建包含以逗号分隔的字段名称列表的排序表达式。

trans-unit.source: The sort direction indicates whether sorting is performed in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: 排序方向指示是否在升序或降序执行排序。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control from outside of the control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常用时需要进行排序，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件从受控制，如从一个不同的控件在页上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This method is also commonly used to programmatically set a default sort order for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when it is first rendered.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常还用于以编程方式设置的默认排序顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制首次呈现时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> events.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法也会引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>

trans-unit.source: The sort expression with which to sort the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 与要排序的排序表达式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source control, but the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> that is associated with the data source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>控件绑定到数据源控件，但<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref>该键相关联的数据源是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the sort direction of the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在排序的列的排序方向。

trans-unit.source: Use the SortDirection property to determine whether the column being sorted is sorted in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: SortDirection 属性用于确定是否按升序或降序排序正在排序的列。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a built-in sorting feature that automatically sets this property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件有内置的排序功能自动设置此属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only when you need to programmatically determine the sort direction or when you are adding your own custom sorting functionality to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 仅在需要以编程方式确定排序方向，或当你要添加到你自己自定义排序功能时，此属性一般用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_SortDirection.Ascending" name="SortDirection.Ascending" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_SortDirection.Ascending" name="SortDirection.Ascending" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 单击超链接列进行排序，但之后时发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件处理排序操作。

trans-unit.source: The Sorted event is raised when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 单击超链接列进行排序，但之后时会引发 Sorted 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理排序操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as custom sorting, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够在每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程，如自定义排序的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the CSS style for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> column when the column is sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的 CSS 样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>列时对列进行排序以升序。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, a style is applied to cells in the column when the data is sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，样式应用于列中的单元格上时数据按升序排序。

trans-unit.source: For example, the column can be highlighted with a specific color when the sort type is ascending.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当升序排序类型时用特定的颜色突出显示列。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a style is applied to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control when the column is sorted in ascending order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应用了样式为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制当数据列进行排序以升序; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the CSS style to apply to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> column heading when the column is sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用到的 CSS 样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>列标题对列排序以升序时。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, an arrow that indicates the sort direction is displayed in the column heading.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，指示排序方向箭头将显示在列标题。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a style is applied to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> heading when the column is sorted in ascending order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应用了样式为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>标题时的列是以升序排序; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> column when the column is sorted in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>时对列进行排序以降序顺序的列。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, a style is applied to cells in the column when the data is sorted in descending order.

trans-unit.source: For example, the column can be highlighted with a specific color when the sort type is descending.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a style is applied to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> when the column is sorted in descending order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style to apply to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> column heading when the column is sorted in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用到的样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>列标题对列排序以降序顺序时。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, an arrow that indicates the sort direction is displayed in the column heading.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，指示排序方向箭头将显示在列标题。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a style is applied to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> heading when the column is sorted in descending order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sort expression associated with the column or columns being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取关联与待排序的列的排序表达式。

trans-unit.source: Use the SortExpression property to determine the sort expression associated with the column or columns being sorted.
trans-unit.target: SortExpression 属性用于确定与待排序的列关联的排序表达式。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a built-in sorting feature that automatically sets this property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件有内置的排序功能自动设置此属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only when you need to programmatically determine the column or columns being sorted or when you are adding your own custom sorting functionality to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性一般用于仅在需要以编程方式确定的列或列进行排序时或当你要添加到你自己自定义排序功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When multiple columns are sorted, this property contains a comma-separated list of the fields by which to sort.
trans-unit.target: 当多个列进行排序时，则此属性包含逗号分隔的作为排序依据的字段列表。

trans-unit.source: The sort expression associated with the column or columns being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 与要排序的列关联的排序表达式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 单击超链接列进行排序，但之前时发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件处理排序操作。

trans-unit.source: The Sorting event is raised when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 单击超链接列进行排序，但之前时会引发 Sorting 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理排序操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the sorting operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，如取消排序操作，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the sort expression for the column and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您可以确定列的排序表达式，并可以指示是否应取消了选择操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the selection operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消选择操作，请设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to programmatically initiate a sort operation, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何以编程方式启动排序操作的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: 返回的结果以控件为目标的回调事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to asynchronously retrieve data and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A> method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件实现<xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>接口并使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>以异步方式检索数据和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A>方法来检索到的数据返回到控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: 回调的结果。

trans-unit.source: Creates the arguments for the callback handler in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference*> method.
trans-unit.target: 创建中的回调处理程序的自变量<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference*>

trans-unit.source: ICallbackEventHandler.RaiseCallbackEvent is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the arguments for the callback handler in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ICallbackEventHandler.RaiseCallbackEvent 是由一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建的自变量中的回调处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给事件处理程序的参数。

trans-unit.target: 页面调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法来引发相应事件的回发事件发生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>

trans-unit.target: 加载和更改通知都完成时之后, 但尚未预呈现发生之前，此调用是在页的生命周期中。

trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPersistedSelector.DataKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: You can specify how selected rows are persisted when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is in paging mode.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定如何选的行时保持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件是否处于分页模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: By default, row selection is based on row index.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，行选择基于行索引。

trans-unit.source: The same row (for example, the third row) is selected on each page.
trans-unit.target: 每一页上选择同一行 （例如，第三行）。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can enable persistence based on the data key of the selected row.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以启用基于所选行的数据键的持久性。

trans-unit.source: In that case, if you select row 3 on page 1 and you move to page 2, no row is selected on page 2.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，如果你选择第 3 行第 1 页上的，并且你将移动到第 2 页，第 2 页上不选择任何行。

trans-unit.source: If you move back to page 1, row 3 is still selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将移回第 1 页，第 3 行仍处于选中状态。

trans-unit.source: To enable this functionality, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用此功能，请将此属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In versions 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5 of ASP.NET, row selection was based only on row index.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 在版本 2.0、 3.0 和 3.5 的 ASP.NET 中，行选择基于仅行索引。

trans-unit.source: By default, row selection in ASP.NET 4 is based on index for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 4 中的行选择基于为了向后兼容的索引。

trans-unit.source: The data-key value for the persisted selected record in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件中持久化选定的记录数据密钥值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> object that represents the postback behavior of the specified button control.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref>表示指定的按钮控件的回发行为的对象。

trans-unit.source: The button control for which to create the callback script.
trans-unit.target: 要为其创建回调脚本按钮控件中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> that represents the postback behavior of the specified button control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"> </xref> ，它表示指定的按钮控件的回发行为。

trans-unit.source: The buttonControl parameter contains .
trans-unit.target: buttonControl 参数包含 。

trans-unit.source: buttonControl causes validation and is attempting to post back to the same container it validates.
trans-unit.target: buttonControl将导致验证，并正尝试进行回发到同一个容器，它会验证。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> value for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref>值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The TagKey property allows the output stream to write the appropriate HTML markup for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: TagKey 属性允许要写入的相应 HTML 标记的输出流<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A> property is set to `true`, this property returns `HtmlTextWriterTag.Div`; otherwise, this property returns `HtmlTextWriterTag.Table`.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A>属性设置为`true`，此属性返回`HtmlTextWriterTag.Div`; 否则为此属性返回`HtmlTextWriterTag.Table`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> value for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref>值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the top pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref>对象，表示中的顶部页导航行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 启用分页后 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>属性`true`)，一个称为的页导航行附加行会自动显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to the other pages and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: 页导航行包含允许用户导航至其他页面，可以显示在顶部、 底部，或同时的顶部和底部的控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the TopPagerRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the top pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 TopPagerRow 属性以编程方式访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象，表示中的顶部页导航行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The TopPagerRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the top pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> TopPagerRow 属性是之后才可用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建中的顶部页导航行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要以编程方式操作顶部页导航行，例如在添加自定义内容时，通常使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the TopPagerRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 之后，必须执行对 TopPagerRow 属性进行任何修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件已经被呈现; 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将覆盖所有更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> that represents the top pager row in the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> ，表示控件中的顶部页导航行。

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control so they can be stored in the control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪视图状态更改为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制以便将它们存储在控件的<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 此对象是可通过访问<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the control's view state.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以将标记控件的视图状态的一部分开始对控件的跟踪并保存更改的起始点。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to call in order to update data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要调用才能更新数据的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性会导致模型绑定要用作数据绑定方法。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Updates the record at the specified row index using the field values of the row.
trans-unit.target: 更新使用的行的字段值的指定的行索引处的记录。

trans-unit.source: Use the UpdateRow method to programmatically update the record at the specified index in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用 UpdateRow 方法以编程方式更新数据源中的指定索引处的记录。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to update a record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要更新来自外部的记录通常使用此方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，例如页上的其他控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method can be called only for the row that is currently in edit mode, or for a row that contains a two-way data-bound input control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以调用此方法仅对当前处于编辑模式的行或行包含双向数据绑定输入的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: 双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。

trans-unit.source: To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定是否在执行更新操作之前执行页验证，使用`causesValidation`参数。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> events.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法也会引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: 要更新的行索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform page validation when this method is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>当调用此方法时; 执行页验证否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to a data source control, but the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> associated with the data source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>控件绑定到数据源控件，但<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref>关联的数据源是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control renders its header in an accessible format.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件呈现其标头中可访问的格式。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性是以使控件的辅助技术设备用户更易于访问。

trans-unit.source: Use the UseAccessibleHeader property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control renders its header row in an accessible format.
trans-unit.target: UseAccessibleHeader 属性用于指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件呈现格式可访问其标题行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性是以使控件的辅助技术设备用户更易于访问。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of this property is `true` and the header for the control is rendered using `<th>` table header cell tags.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此属性的值是`true`和使用呈现该控件的标题`<th>`表头单元格标记。

trans-unit.source: In addition, a `scope="col"` attribute is added to the table header to specify that the header applies to all the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`scope="col"`属性添加到表头以指定标头适用于列中的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: The default rendering of the `<th>` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 默认呈现`<th>`保留了元素，从而文本水平呈现为加粗和居中。

trans-unit.source: Developers can override the style of the `<th>` element using a cascading style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以重写的样式`<th>`元素使用级联样式表。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `false`, the header for the control is rendered using `<td>` table cell tags.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是`false`，使用呈现该控件的标题`<td>`表单元格标记。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control renders its header in an accessible format; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控件呈现其标头中可访问的格式; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the virtual number of items in the data source that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to when custom paging is used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或数据源中设置的虚拟项数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>使用自定义分页时，将控件绑定到。

trans-unit.source: This property is used only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性仅当的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The virtual number of items in the data source that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control is bound to when custom paging is used.
trans-unit.target: 数据中的虚拟项数源<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>使用自定义分页时，将控件绑定到。
